data.actual_result: The white and red bubble dissapear on the Canary logo.
data.expected_result: The white and red bubble stay on the Canary logo.
data.short_description: When we restart Windows Explorer, the red and white dot on the Canary logo dissapear.
data.steps_to_repro: - Re-open Canary. - Open TaskManager. - Right-click on Windows Explorer. - Click on restart.
